description:
The third season of Junjou Romantica.

It follows the ongoing story of three couples:

The Romantica relationship between college student Misaki Takahashi and his tutor, Akihiko Usami.
The stormy Egoist couple—Professor Hiroki Kamijou, a tsundere, doted on by Nowaki Kusama.
The dramatic Terrorist couple—divorced literature professor Yo Miyagi, and his younger lover, Shinobu Tatasuki.

It’s complicated.
But so worth it.

(Source: Crunchyroll, edited)

tags.name: Boys' Love
tags.description: Prominently features romance between two males, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Primarily Adult Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters above a high school age.

tags.name: LGBTQ+ Themes
tags.description: Prominently features characters or themes associated with the LGBTQ+ community, such as sexuality or gender identity.

tags.name: Primarily Male Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of male characters.

tags.name: Shoujo
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult females.

tags.name: Cute Boys Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around male characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Writing
tags.description: Centers around the profession of writing books or novels.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

node.description: A Japanese anime director, storyboard artist, and animator.

__Doujin Circle:__ SPICCA

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/marukawashoten)

Shungiku is a Japanese manga artist, known for her yaoi manga [Junjou Romantica](https://anilist.co/manga/30765/Junjou-Romantica) and [Sekaiichi Hatsukoi](https://anilist.co/manga/40573/Sekaiichi-Hatsukoi-Onodera-Ritsu-no-Baai).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/choco_kiku) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/菊地洋子)

Married to [Eiji Suganuma](https://anilist.co/staff/109167/).

_Note: Not to be confused with [Youko Kikuchi (菊地陽子)](https://anilist.co/staff/141535/), different kanji._

Website | Twitter | Facebook | YouTube Introduction Luck Life is a band which began its activities formally in 2008. It was originally formed in 2005, as its members were classmates at Ibaraki East High School in Osaka Prefecture. Their major debut was with the Bungou Stray Dogs ending theme "Namae wo Yobu yo" in 2016. Members - [PON](https://anilist.co/staff/149059/Masumi-Ueno) (Masumi Ueno) - vocal, guitar - Ikoma (Takahide Ikoma) - guitar, chorus - Taku (Takuya Kubo) - bass - LOVE Ooishi (Yutaka Ooishi) - drums

[Website](http://xfoxtailsx.com) | [Artist Profile (Lantis)](http://www.lantis.jp/artist/foxtails/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/foxtails_kon)

**Introduction:**
Fo'xTails (フォックステイルズ) was a Japanese five-piece rock-band under record label Lantis (2015-2018).

**Final Members:**
- [Takao](https://anilist.co/staff/163423/Takao-Sakuma) (タカオ) - vocalist
- Narukaze (鳴風) - guitarist
- Sakamoto Takayuki (坂本尭之) - bassist
- [TERA](https://anilist.co/staff/153833/Kenji-Terazono) (テラ) - guitarist, programmer

**Former Members:**
- Takahiro (峻洋) - drummer
**Michiko Yokote** is a Japanese scriptwriter. She is the pupil of [Kazunori Itou](https://anilist.co/staff/97941).
A Japanese anime director, storyboard artist, and animator.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/福田道生)

Originating from [Toei Animation](https://anilist.co/studio/18/). Debuted as a director on [Hyakko](https://anilist.co/anime/4550/).
A Japanese anime director, storyboard artist, and animator.
A Japanese anime director, storyboard artist, and animator.
Twitter __Yukio Nishimoto__ is a Japanese director, animation director, episode director and storyboard artist.
**Chikayo Nakamura** is an episode director and storyboard artist.
Not to be confused with the other director [Takashi Yamazaki](https://anilist.co/staff/297520/Takashi-Yamazaki)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/KenjiTerazono)

**Kenji Terazono**, also known by his stage name Tera (stylized as TERA is a Japanese guitarist, programmer and composer. He was the guitarist and programmer of [Fo'xTails](https://anilist.co/staff/122980/FoxTails) (2013-2018).
